roots.description: Vanuatu Borogu Kava is the most popular variety of kava in Vanuatu, served in most of the nakamals on the islands.
Vanuatu Borongoru is the perfect kava to drink for stress relief or to reduce feelings of anxiousness
Melo Melo kava powder brews a complex and slightly sweet kava drink that offers a relaxing, mellow mood.
The all round, powerful mind and body relaxation effects of Fiji Loa Waka make it one of our most popular kavas.
It is a uniquely strong Fiji kava that slows a busy mind, softens tense muscles, and provides a heavy body relaxation.
It is the crown of the roots. Lawena is white and has a distinct Fijian peppery taste. This kava is great for beginners as it is mellow and smooth.
